page.title: 08Domestic Animals
page.content: {Occleston Green Cattery }is modern.It provides temporary and long term acco mmodation for 48 cats.They stay from 2 weeks to 2 months.Each cat has a pen 7foot by 3foot in area.On average eac h cat eats 1 lb.of meat daily.Vaccinat ion certificates for enteritis and cat 'flu' have to be produced prior to ad dmission.The Animal Boarding Establish ment Regulations are strictly enforced vis-a-vis facilities such as kitchens, light,heating etc.Pewter,Chinchilla an d Abyssinia cats are bred for sale,the re being 3 queens(females)and stud cat s for the purpose.Contraceptive pills are given to the cats in winter.In War mingham there are 2 breeding establish ments for {dogs.}However,these are on a small scale breeding Yorkshire terri ers,Dobermann Pinschers,Labradors and Retrievers.
